name: Sandwich Stacker
description:
Left-click a character you wish to play as, and press the spacebar to begin!

The game is controlled solely with the mouse.

-------------------------------------------------------------

Sandwich Stacker was made for Stevens Game Development Club's Game Jam E.

The theme of the jam was education, so myself and Anna Brown took it upon ourselves to make a sandwich-making game for children with special needs.

The game is simple, and unique. Using nothing but click controls, this game slowly teaches children what ingredients are used in certain sandwiches.

The game is nearly complete, it just needs a few more bells and whistles before it is deployed in the Life Skills Software system of games.
